document.full_text: bahraini firms have fired hundreds of mostly shi'ite workers who went on strike to support pro-democracy protesters, part of a government crackdown, an opposition group said on tuesday.
document.title: bahrain firms fire hundreds of strikers in crackdown
lines_and_colors: bahraini firms have fired hundreds of mostly shi'ite workers who went on strike to support pro-democracy protesters, part of a government crackdown, an opposition group said on tuesday.
